content.html: Thank you. I felt that way for a while and I couldn’t cope with it anymore. Selling office space? Forcing people to stop wasting time and money on unplanned APIs? Oh do whatever the world is fucking ending. If you’re south west and want to sack off work to plant trees tomorrow…
content.value:
Thank you. I felt that way for a while and I couldn’t cope with it anymore. Selling office space? Forcing people to stop wasting time and money on unplanned APIs? Oh do whatever the world is fucking ending.

If you’re south west and want to sack off work to plant trees tomorrow…
